title.rendered: Discounts & Giveaways on Friday, Sept 26 at Gottwals Byron 5-Year Celebration!

content.rendered:
Celebrate Byron Gottwals Turning 5 with a Fabulous $5 Off Discount!

Receive $5 off any in-stock purchase of $5 or more! Byron store only. Does not apply to special orders or book transfers. Limit one purchase that day. CAN be used in conjunction with store credit and teacher/military discounts!

We will have the special $5 offer along with giveaways and prize drawings! Please, come enjoy this special day with us.

All About Byron Gottwals Books!

The Byron Gottwals Books started in 2009, two years after the first Gottwals Books opened in Warner Robins. Being the second store, we already knew a lot about how to operate a great used bookstore. We took over the corner space of the Peach Shops, showcasing all of our books in the long front windows. Well, it took off! We were surprised by the response from the locals and the I-75 travelers.

The Byron store is much different now than when it opened. We have new shelves, new paint/decor, and thousands upon thousands more books. We are proud of Gottwals Books #2, and we intend to have a special day to celebrate this 5-year milestone.

Gottwals Team at SIBA Discovery Show

The Gottwals Books team was at the annual SIBA Discovery Show in Norfolk, VA this past weekend. We met plenty of great authors including Rick Bragg, Charles Martin, Lisa Wingate, Karen White… too many to name! One of the highlights was listening to James Patterson give a great talk (pictured below)!

Toy of the Week

Swirl ‘n Spin Art: $9.97

Spin your way to exciting new designs without batteries or assembly! This hand-operated, easy-to-clean spinner art set includes four colorful long-tipped tubes of paint, twenty-five design cards and a suction cup base to hold it in place!
